dcterms:description: The Dow Jones 30, also known as Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA), refers to the thirty blue-chip publicly-traded U.S companies. Daily stock data from January 2011 up to November 2021 (10 year period) was extracted and used. 70 percent of the data was used for training while 30 percent was used for testing the RL agents.
dcterms:title: Dow Jones 30

dcterms:creator: P. Adämmer
R. A. Schüssler
dcterms:description: Various datasets referenced in the context of machine learning applications in finance, including stock prices and credit bureau data.
dcterms:title: Various Financial Datasets

dcterms:description: Various financial datasets used in the context of machine learning research, including stock market sentiment analysis and accounting fraud detection.
dcterms:title: Various Financial Datasets for Machine Learning Research
